name.jp: シールドボーナスの巻物

description.en: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.ar: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.br: Este pergaminho garante um bônus aleatório ao seu escudo. Se o escudo já tiver um bônus, ele será substituído.
description.cns: 此卷轴会让你的盾牌获取随机增益效果。如果该盾牌已经有了增益效果，它将被覆盖。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle gibt deinem Schild einen zufälligen Bonus. Wenn das Schild bereits einen Bonus hat, wird dieser überschrieben.
description.fi: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.fil: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.fr: Ce parchemin donne un bonus aléatoire sur votre bouclier. Si le bouclier a déjà un bonus, il sera remplacé.
description.id: Scroll ini memberikan bonus acak ke perisai Anda. Jika perisai sudah memiliki bonus, itu akan ditimpa.
description.it: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.jp: この巻物は盾にランダムでボーナスステータスを付与します。既にボーナスが付いている場合は上書きされます。
description.kr: 이 두루마리는 방패에 랜덤 보너스를 제공합니다. 방패에 이미 보너스가 있는 경우 새로운 보너스를 적용시킵니다.
description.nl: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.pl: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.ru: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.sp: Este pergamino otorga un bonus aleatorio a tu escudo. Si el escudo ya tiene un bonus se sobreescribirá.
description.sw: This scroll gives a random bonus to your shield. If the shield already has a bonus it will be overwritten.
description.th: สุ่มโบนัสให้โล่ของคุณ หากโล่มีโบนัสอยู่แล้ว จะถูกทับ
description.tw: 可使用在盾牌上獲得額外的能力增幅，若你的物品已獲得加成的話，將會覆蓋掉
description.vi: Cuộn này mang lại một phần thưởng ngẫu nhiên cho lá chắn của bạn. Nếu lá chắn đã có tiền thưởng, nó sẽ bị ghi đè.
